about.bio1: I've been automating businesses for a decade. I've helped 50+ companies save thousands of hours of manual work through intelligent AI solutions and process automation.
about.bio2: I specialize in AI, business process automation, and system integrations. LessManual is the culmination of my knowledge and passion - the mission is to make Polish companies work smarter, not harder.
